mapper.sql: select o.mat_output_id, o.mat_code, o.mat_output_number, o.mat_receive_dept_id, o.mat_receive_user, o.mat_output_time, o.mat_output_user, d.mat_shelf_code, de.dept_id, de.dept_name, d.mat_name from mat_sys_output o left join mat_sys_detail d on o.mat_code = d.mat_code left join mat_sys_floor f on f.floor_code = d.mat_floor_code left join mat_sys_user_floor u on u.floor_id = f.floor_id left join sys_dept de on de.dept_id = o.mat_receive_dept_id left join sys_user su on su.user_id = u.user_id and su.user_name = o.mat_output_user

select o.mat_output_id, o.mat_code, d.mat_name, o.mat_output_number, d.mat_price, round(o.mat_output_number * d.mat_price, 2) as mat_total_price, de.dept_name, o.mat_receive_user, o.mat_output_user, d.mat_shelf_code, d.mat_floor_code, o.mat_output_time from mat_sys_output o left join mat_sys_detail d on o.mat_code = d.mat_code left join mat_sys_floor f on f.floor_code = d.mat_floor_code left join mat_sys_user_floor u on u.floor_id = f.floor_id left join sys_dept de on de.dept_id = o.mat_receive_dept_id left join sys_user su on su.user_id = u.user_id and su.user_name = o.mat_output_user
mapper.insert:
insert into mat_sys_output
mat_output_id, mat_code, mat_output_number, mat_receive_dept_id, mat_receive_user, mat_output_time, mat_output_user,
#{matOutputId}, #{matCode}, #{matOutputNumber}, #{matReceiveDeptId}, #{matReceiveUser}, GETDATE(), #{matOutputUser},
mapper.delete:
delete from mat_sys_output where mat_output_id in
#{matOutputId}
